dao

Interface CompanyDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompanyDBDAO

    public interface CompanyDAO
    the CompanyDAO interface should be implemented in any class that is used for connecting to the database and write or read data from the database,regarding the action for the companys in the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCompany(Company company)
      Receives a company's instance and register it in the database
      java.util.Collection<Company> getAllCompanys()
      returns an ArrayList of all the companys in the database
      Company getCompany(long id)
      Receives an id of a company and returns an instance of that company from the database
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons()
      returns an ArrayList of all the coupons of the current user's company in the database
      boolean login(java.lang.String compName, java.lang.String password)
      checks the database for a company with the given name and the given password
      void removeComapny(Company company)
      removes a company from the database
      void updateCompany(Company company)
      update a company in the database

    • Method Detail

      • createCompany

        void createCompany(Company company)
            throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                   java.lang.InterruptedException,
                   java.sql.SQLException,
                   DuplicateEntryException,
                   NullConnectionException
        Receives a company's instance and register it in the database
        Parameters:
        company - a company's instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - thrown when the company class is not available
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown when the thread is interrupted - might be because the system is shutting down
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown when the sql query is wrong
        DuplicateEntryException - thrown when trying to register a company that already exist
        NullConnectionException - thrown when the connection is null

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String compName,
              java.lang.String password)
       throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
              java.lang.InterruptedException,
              java.sql.SQLException,
              WrongDataInputException,
              NullConnectionException
        checks the database for a company with the given name and the given password
        Parameters:
        compName - the company's name
        password - the company's password
        Returns:
        true value if there is a match' false if there is no match
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - thrown when the company class is not available
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown when the thread is interrupted - might be because the system is shutting down
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown when the sql query is wrong
        WrongDataInputException - thrown when the input does not match any company in the database
        NullConnectionException - thrown when the connection is null
